tool_description: Generates comprehensive analytics on refund patterns, rates, and financial impact from transaction and refund data.

transaction_data_id.description: Reference ID of previously extracted transaction data

refund_reason_analysis.description: Whether to analyze refund reasons if available

time_to_refund_analysis.description: Whether to analyze time between purchase and refund

error_messages: Invalid transaction data ID: Provided ID does not reference valid transaction data.
No refund data found: Transaction data must contain refund transactions for analysis.
Insufficient refund data: At least 5 refunds required for meaningful analysis.
usage: Provide transaction_data_id containing refund data, optionally enable detailed refund reason and timing analysis.

refund_rate.description: Percentage of transactions that resulted in refunds

total_refund_amount.description: Total monetary amount of all refunds

refund_reasons.description: Breakdown of refund reasons and their frequencies

average_time_to_refund.description: Average days between purchase and refund

refund_trends.description: Analysis of refund trends over time
